pt.ist.fenixframework.backend.infinispan
Class InfinispanConfig

java.lang.Object
  pt.ist.fenixframework.Config
      pt.ist.fenixframework.dap.FFDAPConfig
          pt.ist.fenixframework.hibernatesearch.HibernateSearchConfig
              pt.ist.fenixframework.backend.infinispan.InfinispanConfig

public class InfinispanConfig
extends HibernateSearchConfig

This is the infinispan configuration manager used by the fenix-framework-backend-infinispan project.

See Also:
Config

backEnd

protected final InfinispanBackEnd backEnd

ispnConfigFile

protected String ispnConfigFile
This required parameter specifies the location of the XML file used to configure Infinispan. This file should be available in the application's classpath.

useGrouping

public final boolean useGrouping()
The Infinispan grouping goal is to group some keys in the same node. A DomainObject belongs to a group if, when created, it is provided a LocalityHints is provided with Constants.GROUP_ID.

Returns:
true to use the grouping API.
